description:
Hugging Face has called on the US government to prioritise open-source development in its forthcoming AI Action Plan. In a statement to the Office of Science and Technology Policy (OSTP), Hugging Face emphasised that “thoughtful policy can support innovation while ensuring that AI development remains competitive, and aligned with American values.” Hugging Face, which hosts […]

The post Hugging Face calls for open-source focus in the AI Action Plan appeared first on AI News.
title: Hugging Face calls for open-source focus in the AI Action Plan

description:
The UK aims to secure its position as a global leader with additional AI investment, with Technology Secretary Peter Kyle currently in the US to champion Britain’s credentials. As the UK government prioritises AI within its “Plan for Change,” Kyle’s visit aims to strengthen the special relationship between the UK and the US that has […]

The post UK minister in US to pitch Britain as global AI investment hub appeared first on AI News.
title: UK minister in US to pitch Britain as global AI investment hub
